attributes.action: Seaford Council turn our lights back on
attributes.additional_details:
Seaford town council East Sussex switch off their street lighting at 10 pm to save electricity.
This leads to increased risk of danger to the local community from muggers, rapists and thugs.
The town council has got its priorities wrong.
Although the local community has raised numerous concerns the town council refuse to take any notice.
Even the campaign by local radio station Seafordsurf Radio has been ignored.
The Government must step in and lead the way in common sense.
